title: Snake Colors
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: What colors can snakes be? Snake Colors uses photographs to show the various colors found on these scaly creatures. Use this book to teach students about asking and answering questions as well as finding details to support the main idea.
reviewWords: black, blue, green, orange, pink, red, snake, white, yellow

awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /r/ sound
grammar: Complete Sentences                : Recognize and use complete sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word this
